abstract: The latest addition to the growing Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is Holly Petraeus, the wife of Gen. David H. Petraeus, who will direct the Office of Servicemember Affairs.
snippet: The latest addition to the growing Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is Holly Petraeus, the wife of Gen. David H. Petraeus, who will direct the Office of Servicemember Affairs.

headline.main: Consumer Watchdog Builds Up Its Ranks

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
